sources.title: Hooked Bear (1956)
sources.description: Humphrey the bear isn't having much luck with his fishing; every time he catches some nice fish, he gets distracted and drops them. So he goes after the catches of the local anglers instead. But ranger Woodlore frowns on this, insisting the bear fish like one. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/hooked-bear-1956/

metadata.Plot: Humphrey the bear isn't having much luck with his fishing; every time he catches some nice fish, he gets distracted and drops them. So he goes after the catches of the local anglers instead. But ranger Woodlore frowns on this, insisting the bear fish like one.
metadata.Actors: Jack Hannah, James MacDonald, Bill Thompson
